prompts.content:
Given this messages, please summary the writer’s writing style of message in three adjective words or a phrase, and give the antonym of each style. Respond using the following JSON format (In your summary, use single quotation marks ' instead of double quotation marks . DON’T USE double quotation marks):
 {
 Style1: [Styles1],
 Antonym1: [Antonym1],
 Style2: [Styles2],
 Antonym2: [Antonym2],
 Style3: [Styles3],
 Antonym3: [Antonym3]
}
